revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Hatres of Nechthotes, dr. 16; Eusophurios son of Pekos, dr. 16; Petestheus son of Penechtheros, dr. 16; Sarapion son of Penechtheros, dr. 12; [l. 5] Petestheus of Nechthotes, dr. 12; Orsenouphis of Eusophyrios, dr. 12; Nechthotes of Pseuderetes, dr. 12; Taureinos of Pachoumis, dr. 40; [l. 10] Horos of Horos, dr. 12; Phaphis of Phaphis, dr. 12; towards the same total dr. 656 from the month . . . to the month of Pharmouthi . . . in the year of the Emperors Caesars Lucius Septimius [l. 15] Severus Pius Pertinax Arabicus Adiabenicus Parthicus and Marcus Aurelius Antoninus Pius, the Augusti . . . Nektheros son of Pilatos and Oino- and Philop-, tax collectors of taxes in silver of the village Thonis . . . Nedimos son of [l. 20] Horion and Onthon- . . .

listBibl.bibl: P.Princ. III 130 BL IX, 221; P. J. Sijpesteijn, "Corrections on Some Princeton Papyri," ZPE 68 (1987): 143-148
